issue.title: [Doc][Guide] Additional tutorial for R bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Additional **tutorial for R** bindings - lubridate::mday for example: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14816 to be put in the .rst part of the docs.

Also add these correction for the existing Python tutorial:
 \* Change _Lets_ _start_ to _Lets's_ _start_ - (intro), before the Set up section.
 \* Change _Setup_ to _Set up_ in the first sentence of the Set up section.
 \* Change _Lets_ to _Lets's and from **the** updated master_ in Start the work on a new branch section, second and first paragraph.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15351?focusedCommentId=17491912) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12313
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12313>
